t: Amazon.com: Bang: CDs & Vinyl
s: Bought numerous CD's. Now back to vinyl. Great soundstage. Great pressing. If you are a Tommy Bolin fan this is a must. If you a classic rock fan who loves fantastic guitar this is a must. Great song writing also. Now waiting on the repress of James Gang "Miami" hint, hint....

t: James Gang - Yer' Album (Remastered) - Amazon.com Music
s: For two-thirds of this James Gang, a modicum of success and notoriety will follow and come into being fully formed on their Rides Again sophomore offering. But here, it is a semi-pro band swinging for the fences. What they deliver is not an "out-of-here homer". Rather, what we find us an "inside-the-park smash". Early success is predicted; also, it will bring a level of unexpected turmoil. Even so, this CD ...

t: Amazon.com: Miami: CDs & Vinyl
s: The albums Tommy recorded with James Gang, still sound fresh and exciting after 40yrs. As does his Deep Purple album. The mark of good songs, is they stand the test of time. All Tommy's work (except, perhaps, the 2 Zephyr LPs)has done just that. I recommend Miami, and any album Tommy work on. He was a master guitarist, and left us too soon. Give this CD ...

s: I have to admit that I've been a fan of Joe Walsh and The James Gang for many, many years, but until earlier this year I had never thought to listen to this outstanding live album. Why didn't anyone tell me!? Needless to say, I'm very happy that I belatedly took the plunge and ordered this CD.

t: Amazon.com: James Gang Rides Again: CDs & Vinyl
s: I own the original vinyl, and really ... with the CD. The quality of the Digital remix sounds as good as the original to me. Joe Walsh was really on top of his game then. ... Love the James Gang! This album is a killer, but sadly, the original recording is not all that great, so don't be expecting and audiophile experience ...
